sentences.en: A component might perform scientific calculations, collect performance data, count the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, or read the number of dollars in President Bush's campaign coffer.
sentences.cn: 组件可能实现科学计算，收集性能数据，计算1971年1月1日到现在的毫秒数，仰或是读取布什总统竞选活动保险箱里的美金数。

sentences.en: Concrete cofferdams are mostly used for longitudinal cofferdams, high transversal coffer - dams and overflow cofferdams.
sentences.cn: 混凝土围堰较多用于纵向围堰 、 横向高围堰及过水围堰.

sentences.en: Dants seized the handles , and strove to lift the coffer.
sentences.cn: 那个时代,艺术可以使最平凡的金属品变成宝物.

sentences.en: He put the money in coffer secretly.
sentences.cn: 他悄悄地把钱放在保险箱里.

sentences.en: He stood full six feet in height , with noble shoulders and a chest like a coffer - dam.
sentences.cn: 他身长足足有六英尺, 双肩宽大.胸部象个潜水箱.

sentences.en: I'd like a cup of coffer with sugar and cream, please.
sentences.cn: 请给我一杯加糖和奶油的咖啡.

sentences.en: In this economic and political environment, the coffer is coming into being.
sentences.cn: 在这样的经济、政治环境下, 产生了“小金库”现象.

sentences.en: It is awful to see the lean hands of dotage making a coffer of the grave.
sentences.cn: 这是可怕的,看看手中的精益溺爱使围堰严重.

sentences.en: Tea is one of three drinks such as tea, coca and coffer.
sentences.cn: 茶叶是与可可、啡并列的世界三大饮料之一.

sentences.en: The girl is allowed to dunk her biscuits in her coffer.
sentences.cn: 这女孩得到允许,可以把饼干放在咖啡里浸一浸吃.

sentences.en: The product has also been used extensively for coffer damming in civil engineering work.
sentences.cn: 他们的产品在全球也被广泛用于围堰、截流等土木工程工作中.

sentences.en: There are many jewels in the coffer.
They drank coffer or bottled lemonade, in the pleasant, earned ease of Sunday afternoon.
sentences.cn: 他们喝着咖啡或者瓶装的柠檬水, 在快乐的 、 来之不易的悠闲中,消磨着这个星期天下午的时光.

sentences.en: This coffer was painted black, and the cabriolet yellow.
sentences.cn: 箱子是黑漆的, 车身则是黄漆.

sentences.en: Years passed, happy years when the roses bloomed and the copper coffer grew.
sentences.cn: 几年过去了，幸福的几年过去了，这几年玫瑰开放，铜保险箱在变大。

trans.tran_cn: 保险柜，保险箱，金库，资金，财源，[建]天花板的镶板
trans.tran_en: a large strong box used to hold valuable or religious objects
